title: Not authorized to access this page
body:
I really need to see that article, someone please take pics and post a imgur link for them. I have tried logging out, deleting cookies, closing and opening browser, logging in manually and I still get this error. I have been trying with Chrome, IE and Firefox for about a half a hour already but I still get no authorization to access that article. 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115006740568--May-3-Click-here-if-you-ve-crashed-and-received-a-DirectX-error-or-if-you-see-an-offset-loading-screen-

replies.body: So, that article has already been taken down and deleted since that specific DirectX issue should be solved at this point. I'd still love to help troubleshoot and figure out this problem though, so feel free to hit me back up with some details as to what's going on!
